00150 static void setPixmap(QPainter& painter, QToolButton* b)
00151       {
00152       QPixmap pm(PMW, PMW);
00153 
00154       painter.begin(&pm);
00155       pm.fill(Qt::white);
00156 
00157       b->setPixmap(pm);
00158       painter.end();
00159       }

00161 //---------------------------------------------------------
00162 //   mouseMoveEvent
00163 //---------------------------------------------------------
00164 
00165 void Pad::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* ev)
00166       {
00167       move(ev->globalX()-dx, ev->globalY() - dy);
00168       }
00169 
00170 //---------------------------------------------------------
00171 //   mousePressEvent
00172 //---------------------------------------------------------
00173 
00174 void Pad::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* ev)
00175       {
00176       dx = ev->globalX() - x();
00177       dy = ev->globalY() - y();
00178       }

00180 //---------------------------------------------------------
00181 //   setButton
00182 //---------------------------------------------------------
00183 
00184 static void setButton(QToolButton* b, bool flag)
00185       {
00186       b->blockSignals(true);
00187       b->setOn(flag);
00188       b->blockSignals(false);
00189       }

00191 //---------------------------------------------------------
00192 //   setOn
00193 //---------------------------------------------------------
00194 
00195 void Pad::setOn(bool flag, int cmd)
00196       {
00197       int id = -1;
00198       for (int i = 0; i < PAD_KEYS; ++i) {
00199             if (padTrans[_padNo][i].cmd == cmd) {
00200                   id = i;
00201                   break;
00202                   }
00203             }
00204 
00205       switch (id) {
00206             case -1:        break;
00207             case PAD_0:     setButton(button0, flag); break;
00208             case PAD_1:     setButton(button1, flag); break;
00209             case PAD_2:     setButton(button2, flag); break;
00210             case PAD_3:     setButton(button3, flag); break;
00211             case PAD_4:     setButton(button4, flag); break;
00212             case PAD_5:     setButton(button5, flag); break;
00213             case PAD_6:     setButton(button6, flag); break;
00214             case PAD_7:     setButton(button7, flag); break;
00215             case PAD_8:     setButton(button8, flag); break;
00216             case PAD_9:     setButton(button9, flag); break;
00217             case PAD_COMMA: setButton(buttonComma, flag); break;
00218             case PAD_MINUS: setButton(buttonMinus, flag); break;
00219             case PAD_PLUS:  setButton(buttonPlus, flag); break;
00220             case PAD_ENTER: setButton(buttonEnter, flag); break;
00221             case PAD_NUM:   setButton(buttonEscape, flag); break;
00222             case PAD_DIV:   setButton(buttonDivision, flag); break;
00223             case PAD_MULT:  setButton(buttonMultiplication, flag); break;
00224             }
00225       }

00231 
00232 void Pad::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* ev)
00233       {
00234       emit keyEvent(ev);
00235       }

00237 //---------------------------------------------------------
00238 //   setPadNo
00239 //---------------------------------------------------------
00240 
00241 void Pad::setPadNo(int n)
00242       {
00243       _padNo = n;
00244       blockSignals(true);
00245       padNoGroup->setButton(n + PAD_N0);
00246       blockSignals(false);
00247 
00248       for (int i = 0; i <padGroup->count(); ++i) {
00249             QToolButton* b = (QToolButton*)(padGroup->find(i));
00250             b->setOn(false);
00251             QToolTip::add(b, tr(padTrans[_padNo][i].help));
00252             }
00253 
00254       QPainter p(this);
00255       p.scale(2.0, 2.0);
00256 
00257       switch(_padNo) {
00258             case 0:
00259                   button7->setIconSet(naturalIcon);
00260                   button8->setIconSet(sharpIcon);
00261                   button9->setIconSet(flatIcon);
00262                   button6->setIconSet(noteIcon);
00263                   button0->setIconSet(quartrestIcon);
00264                   buttonComma->setIconSet(dotIcon);
00265                   buttonDivision->setIconSet(sforzatoaccentIcon);
00266                   buttonMultiplication->setIconSet(staccatoIcon);
00267                   buttonMinus->setIconSet(tenutoIcon);
00268 
00269                   button5->setIconSet(note2Icon);
00270                   button4->setIconSet(note4Icon);
00271                   button3->setIconSet(note8Icon);
00272                   button2->setIconSet(note16Icon);
00273                   button1->setIconSet(note32Icon);
00274                   break;
00275 
00276             case 1:
00277                   setPixmap(p, button0);
00278                   setPixmap(p, button1);
00279                   setPixmap(p, button2);
00280                   setPixmap(p, button3);
00281                   setPixmap(p, button4);
00282                   setPixmap(p, button5);
00283                   setPixmap(p, button6);
00284                   setPixmap(p, button7);
00285                   setPixmap(p, button8);
00286                   setPixmap(p, button9);
00287                   setPixmap(p, buttonComma);
00288 
00289                   buttonDivision->setIconSet(sforzatoaccentIcon);
00290                   buttonMultiplication->setIconSet(staccatoIcon);
00291                   buttonMinus->setIconSet(tenutoIcon);
00292                   break;
00293 
00294             case 2:
00295                   buttonDivision->setIconSet(sharpsharpIcon);
00296                   buttonMultiplication->setIconSet(flatflatIcon);
00297                   button7->setIconSet(naturalIcon);
00298                   button8->setIconSet(sharpIcon);
00299                   button9->setIconSet(flatIcon);
00300 
00301                   setPixmap(p, button0);
00302                   setPixmap(p, button1);
00303                   setPixmap(p, button2);
00304                   setPixmap(p, button3);
00305                   setPixmap(p, button4);
00306                   setPixmap(p, button5);
00307                   setPixmap(p, button6);
00308                   setPixmap(p, buttonComma);
00309                   setPixmap(p, buttonMinus);
00310                   break;
00311 
00312             case 3:
00313                   setPixmap(p, button0);
00314                   setPixmap(p, button1);
00315                   setPixmap(p, button2);
00316                   setPixmap(p, button3);
00317                   setPixmap(p, button4);
00318                   setPixmap(p, button5);
00319                   setPixmap(p, button6);
00320                   button7->setPixmap(*sbeam);
00321                   button8->setPixmap(*mbeam);
00322                   button9->setPixmap(*nbeam);
00323                   setPixmap(p, buttonComma);
00324                   setPixmap(p, buttonMultiplication);
00325                   buttonDivision->setPixmap(*beam32);
00326                   setPixmap(p, buttonMinus);
00327                   break;
00328 
00329             case 4:
00330                   setPixmap(p, button0);
00331                   setPixmap(p, button1);
00332                   setPixmap(p, button2);
00333                   setPixmap(p, button3);
00334                   setPixmap(p, button4);
00335                   setPixmap(p, button5);
00336                   setPixmap(p, button6);
00337                   setPixmap(p, button7);
00338                   setPixmap(p, button8);
00339                   setPixmap(p, button9);
00340                   setPixmap(p, buttonComma);
00341                   setPixmap(p, buttonMultiplication);
00342                   setPixmap(p, buttonDivision);
00343                   setPixmap(p, buttonMinus);
00344                   break;
00345             }
00346       }

00351 
00352 Pad::Pad(QWidget* parent, const char* name)
00353    : Pad1Base(parent, name, Qt::WStyle_Customize | Qt::WType_TopLevel | Qt::WStyle_Tool
00354 /*  | WStyle_NoBorderEx*/ | Qt::WStyle_StaysOnTop)
00355       {
00356       setCursor(Qt::pointingHandCursor);
00357       connect(padNoGroup, SIGNAL(clicked(int)), SIGNAL(keyPadToggled(int)));
00358       connect(padGroup, SIGNAL(clicked(int)), SIGNAL(keyPadToggled(int)));
00359 
00360       sbeam  = new QPixmap(sbeam_xpm);
00361       mbeam  = new QPixmap(mbeam_xpm);
00362       nbeam  = new QPixmap(nbeam_xpm);
00363       beam32 = new QPixmap(beam32_xpm);
00364 
00365       setPadNo(0);
00366       setFocusPolicy(Qt::NoFocus);
00367       }
